trans:
(Byakuya) "ğŸ“±What are you talking about without my permission?"
(Mizuki) "Byakuya... If you wear a cat-ear maid outfit, I will take you to a cat cafe."
(Byakuya) "ğŸ“±A cat cafe... I want to go, but... a cat-ear maid outfit... You definitely have to take me there."
(An) "If that is the case and you like sweets, come to my shop. We have lots of delicious sweets."
(Byakuya) "ğŸ“±Tell me the location next time. I will definitely go."
